text: Disco is a box-set of three albums by Jamaican recording artist Grace Jones released in May 2015. The album contains Portfolio (1977), Fame (1978), and Muse (1979), all of which were recorded at Philadelphia's Sigma Sound with disco artist Tom Moulton as producer, in their full album length..
